changes.purpose: Emotion cache management for RTL support

file_insights.critical_info: All three dependencies are related to RTL (Right-to-Left) support implementation

patterns_discovered.description: Installation of complementary RTL support packages following Material-UI ecosystem pattern
Building upon existing @emotion/react and @emotion/styled with cache layer for advanced styling
Adding @emotion/cache and stylis as prerequisites for @mui/stylis-plugin-rtl functionality

gotchas_discovered.description: @emotion/cache version must align with existing @emotion/react (^11.11.3) and @emotion/styled (^11.11.0)
Installing @mui/stylis-plugin-rtl is insufficient - requires configuration in theme setup to be functional
Stylis ^4.3.1 may have breaking changes compared to earlier versions - ensure compatibility with RTL plugin expectations

approach_outcome.summary: Successfully added three RTL-related dependencies to frontend package.json
approach_outcome.commit_integrity: Single atomic commit capturing all three related changes

recommendations.recommendation: Configure RTL theme setup in Material-UI theme file using installed dependencies
Verify RTL rendering after configuration with Arabic/Persian language content
Document RTL configuration in project setup guide for future developers
Run dependency audit to ensure no conflicts with existing emotion/MUI versions after installation
